thread.title: Good2Go® Auto Insurance Celebrates National Teen Driver Safety Week
thread.title_full: Good2Go® Auto Insurance Celebrates National Teen Driver Safety Week - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Good2Go® Auto Insurance Celebrates National Teen Driver Safety Week
text:
Good2Go
ATLANTA , Oct. 20, Good2Go®, specialists in offering minimum coverage auto insurance, is proud to announce that they are honoring National Teen Driver Safety Week with a special donation to SADD (Students Against Destructive Decisions).
National Teen Driver Safety Week (NTDSW), takes place from October 18 through the 24th this year, and is dedicated to raising awareness and seeking solutions to preventable teen deaths and injuries on the road. Celebrating NTDSW is a natural fit for Good2Go®, a company known for their Cell Phone Safety Discount, which is designed to reward drivers who take action to become safer and more responsible on the road.
"Encouraging and celebrating driver safety has always been important to us at Good2Go® -- that's why we offer a Cell Phone Safety Discount," says Joe DeLago , CEO of Good2Go®. "It's also why we're so proud to support SADD, and their efforts to prevent risky and impaired behavior amongst our youngest drivers, especially at such a poignant time of year."
To learn more about NTDSW, and how you can get involved, visit: teendriversource.org. To find out about how you can qualify for Good2Go®'s Cell Phone Safety Discount, visit: Good2Go.com.
About Good2Go®: Based in Atlanta, GA , Good2Go® is a member of American Independent Companies, which offers affordable car insurance online to help uninsured drivers get the car insurance they need to drive legally. Good2Go® specializes in minimum liability car insurance, and also offers collision and comprehensive coverage. For more information, visit good2go.com
